q: How can I buy using a Gift card?
a:
It's simple! When you're prompted to choose a Payment Method for your order, choose 'Gift Card' as the Payment Method &

1. Enter your 16-digit Gift Card Number & the 6-digit Gift Card PIN
2. Click 'Confirm Order'

You can apply a total of 15 Gift Cards per order & if your Gift Card value is less than the order amount, you'll be asked to select an additional payment method to complete the payment.
